Strike_Gold.NAME: Strike
Strike_Gold.DESCRIPTION: Cycle if Strength < 0. NL Deal !D! damage.

Defend_Gold.NAME: Defend
Defend_Gold.DESCRIPTION: Cycle if Dexterity < 0. NL Gain !B! Block.

AttackMode.NAME: Attack Mode
AttackMode.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose !M! Dexterity.

DefenseMode.NAME: Defense Mode
DefenseMode.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Lose !M! Strength.

HyperBeam.NAME: Hyper Beam
HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! Dazed on top of your draw pile.
HyperBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! Dazed on top of your draw pile.

ShieldGenerator.NAME: Shield Generator
ShieldGenerator.DESCRIPTION: Block doesn't expire at the start of your next !M! turns. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable.

Analyze.NAME: Analyze
Analyze.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [R]  and draw !M!  more card.
Analyze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [R]  and draw !M!  more cards.

VentSteam.NAME: Vent Steam
VentSteam.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

ChargeShot.NAME: Charge Shot
ChargeShot.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !M! damage for each turn this was retained.

ElectricArmor.NAME: Electric Armor
ElectricArmor.DESCRIPTION: Cycle if Dexterity < 1. NL Gain Thorns equal to your Dexterity.
ElectricArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cycle if Dexterity < 1. NL Gain Thorns equal to your Dexterity + !M!.

BubbleShield.NAME: Bubble Shield
BubbleShield.DESCRIPTION: Cycle if Dexterity < 1. NL Gain Plated Armor equal to your Dexterity.
BubbleShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cycle if Dexterity < 1. NL Gain Plated Armor equal to your Dexterity + !M!.

ReactiveShield.NAME: Reactive Shield
ReactiveShield.DESCRIPTION: Cycle if no enemy intends to attack. NL Gain !B! Block.

FlameOrb.NAME: Flame Orb
FlameOrb.DESCRIPTION: Cycle. When cycled: NL A random enemy loses !M! HP.
FlameOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cycle. When cycled: NL A random enemy loses !M! HP and gains 1 Vulnerable.

ShockOrb.NAME: Shock Orb
ShockOrb.DESCRIPTION: Cycle. When cycled: NL ALL enemies NL lose !M! HP.
ShockOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cycle. When cycled: NL ALL enemies NL lose !M! HP and you gain !B! Block.

GuardOrb.NAME: Guard Orb
GuardOrb.DESCRIPTION: Cycle. When cycled: NL Gain !B! Block.
GuardOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL Put a Guard Orb into your discard pile.

ScopeOrb.NAME: Scope Orb
ScopeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Cycle. When cycled: NL A random enemy gains 1 Vulnerable.
ScopeOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL Put a Scope Orb into your discard pile.

BatteryOrb.NAME: Battery Orb
BatteryOrb.DESCRIPTION: Cycle. When cycled: NL A card in your hand costs 1  less this turn.
BatteryOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cycle. When cycled: NL A card in your hand costs 1  less this turn. NL Put a random Orb into your discard pile.

OrbGenesis.NAME: Orb Genesis
OrbGenesis.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Orbs to your draw pile.
OrbGenesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random upgraded Orbs to your draw pile.

OrbAssault.NAME: Orb Assault
OrbAssault.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 Broken Orbs into your draw pile. NL When a card cycles, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

BrokenOrb.NAME: Broken Orb
BrokenOrb.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Cycle. When cycled: NL Lose !M! HP.

Autoturret.NAME: Autoturret
Autoturret.DESCRIPTION: When a card cycles, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

Electrocute.NAME: Electrocute
Electrocute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Target loses !M! Strength for the rest of this turn.

CripplingShot.NAME: Crippling Shot
CripplingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this dealt unblocked damage, apply 99 Weak. Exhaust.

Backup.NAME: Backup
Backup.DESCRIPTION: Choose a non-rare card from your hand. Put a copy into your discard pile.
Backup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a non-rare card from your hand. Put a copy into your discard pile.

SweepLaser.NAME: Sweep Laser
SweepLaser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

ModeShift.NAME: Mode Shift
ModeShift.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Swap your Strength and Dexterity. NL Draw !M! cards.

Versatility.NAME: Versatility
Versatility.DESCRIPTION: If the target intends to attack, gain !B! Block. Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

FlakBarrage.NAME: Flak Barrage
FlakBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Cycle if Strength < 1. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

Disorient.NAME: Disorient
Disorient.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose Strength equal to your Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
Disorient.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose Strength equal to your Dexterity + !M!. NL Exhaust.

MassProduction.NAME: Mass Production
MassProduction.DESCRIPTION: Choose a non-rare card in your draw pile. Exhaust your hand and replace it with copies of that card. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No non-rare cards in draw pile.

Synchronize.NAME: Synchronize
Synchronize.DESCRIPTION: When you draw 2 of the same card in a row, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

SiegeForm.NAME: Siege Form
SiegeForm.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, gain !M! Strength until the end of the turn.

HammerDown.NAME: Hammer Down
HammerDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double your Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
HammerDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double your Strength and Dexterity.

Enhance.NAME: Enhance
Enhance.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, upgrade a random card in your discard pile for this combat.
Enhance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each turn, upgrade !M! random cards in your discard pile for this combat.

SuppressiveFire.NAME: Suppressive Fire
SuppressiveFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Block doesn't expire at the start of your next turn.

OneWayMirror.NAME: One-Way Mirror
OneWayMirror.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

SpinDrive.NAME: Spin Drive
SpinDrive.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, draw a card. NL Works !M! times per turn.

Disruptor.NAME: Disruptor
Disruptor.DESCRIPTION: When you take attack damage, gain that much Block.

ShieldBurst.NAME: Shield Burst
ShieldBurst.DESCRIPTION: Lose all your Block. NL Deal twice that much damage.
ShieldBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all your Block. NL Deal three times that much damage.

Antimatter.NAME: Antimatter
Antimatter.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have 0 energy. NL Deal !M! damage for each card in hand.

ClockworkEgg.NAME: Clockwork Egg
ClockworkEgg.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Can be upgraded 4 more times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add an Attack Mode+ and Defense Mode+ to your hand. NL Can be upgraded 3 more times.
Gain 3 Strength. NL Gain 3 Dexterity. NL Can be upgraded 2 more times.
Next turn, gain NL [R] [R] [R] [R] and draw NL 4 more cards. NL Can be upgraded 1 more time.
Gain all 3 Egg relics, and a random rare relic after combat. Permanently remove this card from your deck.

HastyRepair.NAME: Hasty Repair
HastyRepair.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Lose 2 Max HP. NL Exhaust.

GatlingGun.NAME: Gatling Gun
GatlingGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 2X times.

BatteryAcid.NAME: Battery Acid
BatteryAcid.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] . Add a Slimed to your hand.
BatteryAcid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] [R] . NL Add a Slimed to your hand.

Bunker.NAME: Bunker
Bunker.DESCRIPTION: When a card is Retained, gain !M! Block.

Reboot.NAME: Reboot
Reboot.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

HeavyBolt.NAME: Heavy Bolt
HeavyBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! random cards.

FierceBash.NAME: Fierce Bash
FierceBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Hits twice if the enemy doesn't intend to attack or defend.

Fabricate.NAME: Fabricate
Fabricate.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your discard pile. Shuffle !M! copy of it into your draw pile.
Fabricate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your discard pile. Shuffle !M! copies of it into your draw pile.
